name: GB/X
description:
The mechanics are a simplified version of the 1981 Tom Moldvay edition of the Dungeons & Dragons Basic Rulebook, with some additional material inspired by the David "Zeb" Cook edition of the D&D Expert Rulebook, the Rules Cyclopedia edition of D&D from 1991, and the 5e edition of D&D  from 2014.

Made for My First Game Jam: Summer 2022.

You can find the source code here: https://gitlab.com/errantcandian/gbx
